ui.markdown_supported: You can use Markdown syntax to add formatting to the text.

dash.greeting: Our tomorrow is of our own making.

api.tokens_intro: Improv.ee offers a technical API for integrating 3rd party systems. You'll need to use a personal API token in order to authenticate to the API. API documentation is available at {apiDoc}.

attr.title_description: Event sub-title, if it differs from production title. A visitor sees both titles. Leave this blank, if the event does not use a sub-title.
attr.description_description: Event description, if this concrete occurance needs extra details that differ from that of the Production. Can be left blank.
attr.place_description: Venue where the event takes place

organization.list_intro: An Organization is a group of improvisers who work and perform together. An Organization has a name, list of members, description and other attributes. Organizations can create productions - performances, workshops and festivals.
organization.name_taken: An Organization with this name already exists (you'll need to use a different name). If this organization belongs to you, talk to your group and ask whoever created the organization to add you as a member instead.
organization.you_dont_have_any: You don't currently belong to any Organizations. You can either be invited to become a member of an existing Organization (talk to the Organization administrator); or create your own brand new Organization.

production.you_dont_belong_to_any_org: You don't belong to any Organization yet. In order to create Productions, you'll either need to join or found an Organization.
production.list_intro: This table shows all Productions, that have been created by any of your organizations. A Production is a concept of a show, workshop or a festival. Once Production has multiple Events (happening times).

attr.title: Title
attr.title_description: Format, show, festival or workshop title
attr.excerpt_description: Excerpt is a shortened description of the production that is shown as a preview in the Schedule.
attr.description_description: What is this Production? What can the participants expect? This is where you get to sell your Production and provide all needed details.
attr.organizers_description: Choose Organizations who are involved with this Production. Chosen Organizations will get permissions to change this Production's details!
attr.tags_description: Add any number of Tags that help to describe this Production. For example, for workshops, add Tag 'Workshop'.

img.header_description: This image will be shown in the header of the event page. The picture should be in 16:9 format and at least 600px in height.
